message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for a price of $1200000. I think this is a great deal considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to sell at $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $1100000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1050000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings to my business.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to sell at $1050000. I'm willing to meet you at $1080000, which is a bit above my initial offer. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1080000, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1075000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings to my business.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to sell at $1075000. I'm willing to meet you at $1090000, which is a bit above your latest offer. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings to your business.
